description.value:
Staff - Legendary (Requires Attunement by a Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard)

This staff can be wielded as a magic Quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with it. While you hold it, you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls. While holding the staff, you have Advantage on saving throws against spells.

Activation - 50 Charges (Regains [[/r 4d6+2]] Charges at Dawn)

  • While holding the staff, you can expend charges to activate one of the following magical effects using your spell save DC:

    • Reaction (0 Charges) - Spell Absorption:

      Reaction
      Trigger: When another creature casts a spell that targets only you.

      Utility

      • The staff absorbs the magic of the spell, canceling its effect and gaining a number of charges equal to the absorbed spell's level. However, if doing so brings the staff's total number of charges above 50, the staff explodes as if you activated its Retributive Strike

    • Action (0 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.fsKqUGAIN0YXi4Dm]{Arcane Lock}

    • Action (0 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.zWjDq2YlL1XWOcji]{Detect Magic}

    • Action (0 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.fb3MDp9gl7vibSr5]{Enlarge/Reduce}

    • Action (0 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.e4MmHYtpD4jFrRuH]{Light}

    • Action (0 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.5q8pIqm30Geurdx2]{Mage Hand}

    • Action (0 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.cwMTnqjwjFYeJtSR]{Protection from Evil and Good}

    • Action (2 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.AVOHD5ueiuXdw9VS]{Flaming Sphere}

    • Action (2 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.vWQiuirTFxetH3lm]{Invisibility}

    • Action (2 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.ImAJahFvkxJnFmaC]{Knock}

    • Action (2 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.QbacOEHBdmvlUYl8]{Web}

    • Action (3 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.oZwKW3I3yzrSdpLE]{Dispel Magic}

    • Action (4 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.gNFMj9wf8ZpfSCDd]{Ice Storm}

    • Action (4 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.zQ7lBRzId8peTjor]{Wall of Fire}

    • Action (5 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.1A5qH1CkDOvUroqh]{Passwall}

    • Action (5 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.EihC0prUS7NZDdtL]{Telekinesis}

    • Action (7 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.sm66v23hm3vEeaTQ]{Conjure Elemental (Level 5)}

    • Action (7 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.pbT9cw6nsjpmwrVZ]{Fireball (Level 7)}

    • Action (7 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.mVhHk4YEzfICiaiz]{Lightning Bolt (Level 7)}

    • Action (7 Charges) - @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.C5WHRAIBoRqJUcNm]{Plane Shift}

    • Action (Remaining Charge) - Retributive Strike: You can take an Action to break the staff over your knee or against a solid surface. The staff is destroyed and releases its magic in an explosion that fills a 30 ft. Emanation originating from itself. You have a [[/roll 1d100]]{50 percent chance} to instantly travel to a random plane of existence, avoiding the explosion. If you fail to avoid the effect, you take Force damage equal to [[/damage 16 * @item.uses.value force]]{16 times the number of charges in the staff}. Each other creature in the area makes a Dexterity Save.

      [[/save dex 17]]{Dexterity Save (DC 17)}

      • Failure: [[/damage 6 * @item.uses.value force]]{6 * times the number of charges in the staff Force Damage}.

      • Success: Half damage.

  • If you expend the last charge, roll [[/r 1d20]]. On a 20, the staff regains [[/r 1d12 + 1]] charges.

Foundry Note

The Spell Absorption activity allows you to select the level of the cast spell and restores that number of charges.
